 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּזַר‎</span>] **verb** ==scatter== (usually regarded as secondary form of  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בזר‎</span> q. v.; Late Hebrew ***id.*** Pi\`el (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כנס‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כנשׁ‎</span>), Niph\`al; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rend, slit***, also ***separate, disperse***); — 

**Qal** ***Passive participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׂה פְזוּרָה‎</span> [[Jer.50.17|Jer 50:17]] ***a scattered sheep*** is Israel (i.e. driven off, isolated). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְזְרוּ‎</span> [[Ps.141.7|Ps 141:7]] our bones ***are scattered*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפִי שְׁאוֺל‎</span>. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּזַּר‎</span> [[Ps.53.6|Ps 53:6]]; [[Ps.112.9|Ps 112:9]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפַזֵּר‎</span> [[Ps.147.16|Ps 147:16]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּפַזְּרִי‎</span> [[Jer.3.13|Jer 3:13]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפַזֵּר‎</span> [[Prov.11.24|Prov 11:24]] — ***scatter*** [[Ps.89.11|Ps 89:11]]; [[Ps.53.6|Ps 53:6]]; [[Ps.147.16|Ps 147:16]] (all subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Joel.4.2|Joel 4:2]] object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּרָכַיִךְ‎</span> [[Jer.3.13|Jer 3:13]], of Israel running hither and thither to strange gods; absolute of spending money [[Ps.112.9|Ps 112:9]] (alms), [[Prov.11.24|Prov 11:24]]. **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפֻוָּר‎</span> [[Esth.3.3|Esth 3:3]] ***scattered***, of Israel 

I, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּח‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פחח‎</span>.
